channel.title: Coverage on Girls with Deep Pockets

item.title: Articles worth reading (1st Nov 2016)
item.description: It’s been fantastic to see that there’s actually a huge proportion of women out there demanding pockets. As a result, there’s been some nifty articles on the web that are well worth reading. Our Fave Places: Line Cut Supply Article interviewing a Sheffield, UK based designer of womens workwear. Aimee insists on pocket in all her designs! Hello Giggles: 11 stages of fake pockets being the worst fashion LIE of all time Gif’s ahoy!
